desc: Nami Membership is a special program for ATS token holders. For a minimum starting deposit from 1000 ATS, investors are entitled to VIP benefits from Nami, including but not limited to: 50% trading fee discount, exclusive access to Nami IEO and various airdrop of newly listed tokens on Nami Exchange.
no_stake: You have not joined into staking ATS yet
unstake_note_1: The unstake amount of ATS will be returned tomorrow.
unstake_note_2: You will still receive today interest.
no_zero: ATS amount have to be bigger than 0
